sentences: Koid on ülikonnale augud sisse söönud.
Seda ei riku koi ega rooste.
context: The Estonian word 'riideid' appears to be part of the compound word 'riidekoi', which means 'clothes moth'. This is a type of small butterfly whose larvae damage clothing, wood, plants, etc. The word 'riide-' in this context refers to clothes/textiles, making it clear that this specific type of moth infests fabrics and textiles.
